Text for Radio-Button

enter emailadress or faxnumber -> chose the delivery typ

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('SCR[OXA300D]: List with not financed invoices')

Text.val: Do something in the Parent Task, to recognize something changed
OK pressed
Messages if something wrong
Report type = file -> only email or ftp are allowed
All OK -> Create XML-File
After creating XML-File leave the screen
